name: AI-Dev Uncensored HTTPS
description: AI Development Agent with HTTPS support and 100% uncensored operation
readme:
# AI-Dev Uncensored HTTPS

Deploy your AI development agent with HTTPS support and 100% uncensored operation.

## Setup

1. Configure your API keys in the environment variables
2. The container will automatically start with HTTPS on port 8443
3. Access the API documentation at https://your-pod-ip:8443/docs

## Features

- ✅ 100% Uncensored Operation
- ✅ HTTPS/SSL Support
- ✅ GPU Acceleration
- ✅ Multi-worker Setup
- ✅ RunPod Optimized

## Environment Variables

Required:
- OPENAI_API_KEY: Your OpenAI API key
- ANTHROPIC_API_KEY: Your Anthropic API key (optional)

Optional:
- LLM_BACKEND: openai, anthropic, local (default: openai)
- VECTOR_BACKEND: qdrant, pinecone, local (default: qdrant)

## Access

- HTTPS API: https://your-pod-ip:8443
- HTTP (redirects): http://your-pod-ip:8000
- Documentation: https://your-pod-ip:8443/docs
- Health Check: https://your-pod-ip:8443/health
